name: Zombie House (Adam Harris)
description:
Zombie House

Zombie House is a wave-based survival FPS where the player has to fight through waves of zombies that increase in size each wave. 

Currently in Development 

Current Features

- 95% Gameplay complete, a few minor glitches are likely, please comment any that you find

- A door unlock system allowing you to expand your playable area

- 4 types of pickups; ammo, double damage, full health, and health regeneration

- One type of enemy

Future Features

- Actual models for enemies that arent cylinders with cubes for arms

- Animations

- 3 full fledged levels, a 1940s mansion, an abandoned prison and a shopping mall. 

- Multiple types of enemies

*So far only one level has been implemented, just press "Play Random Level" on the main menu to be taken to it.
